content: I'm practicing my coin-tossing skills. No matter how I toss 'em up, I gotta catch 'em all! If I let 'em fall and hurt the skies above mah~, they'll lose their aura!
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-单一闲聊-有条件-NPC自身-手持物-特殊道具-1010云果_单一闲聊
